overview: A neon-noir set in the underbelly of Seoul. Sam IL is a street fighter who was abandoned at birth by his Mother in a coin locker. His life has been one of extreme violence and isolation. After a brutal near death experience Sam IL is forced to contemplate his past whilst accepting the non-existence of his future.
tagline: As long as you can still hear your heart beating... you have to keep fighting back.
title: If I Had a Heart
